resources.string:
This Browser was created as a part of my studies in the Technion for semestrial exam in 2019 on Android class, that was tuoted by Muhamad Eawedat.
It took me about 3 evenings to build it and another 3 to "polish" it a bit. 

	Dima (2019).

Help Contents:
1.Using the 'Browser'
2.Using the 'Favorites'
3.Using the 'Settings'

		-Browser-
In order to use the browser, please open the side menu and press the browser button. Next the browser window will appear, allowing you to enter an url to the desired site. 
After entering the site address, please press Go button to load the desired page.

		- Favorites-
In order to use the favorites, please open the side menu and press the favorites button. Next the favorites window will appear, allowing you to manage your favorite links.

 		-Settings-
In order to use the settings, please open the side menu and press the settings button. Next the settings window will appear, allowing you to manage your settings.

-END OF FILE-
Hello! I recommend you to try a cool browser named \'Compass Browser\'. You can download it here:\nhttps://drive.google.com/file/d/1qrJexTa0Hmm7VqYzgtz6Y-cz7l1lV6v-/view?usp=sharing\nCheers!
